reviews.review_text: I've taken 15 courses in this field, but this one stands out. The practical focus on session structure helped me pivot my entire business model. Within 3 months I had filled my calendar. The community support was incredible too.

I've taken 10 courses in this field, but this one stands out. The practical focus on outcome measurement helped me pivot my entire business model. Within 2 months I had launched group programs. The community support was incredible too.

This certification completely transformed my practice. I was struggling to transition from general wellness coaching to Default, and this course gave me the exact framework I needed. The ethical boundaries module alone was worth the investment. Now I have 4 new clients and finally feel confident in my niche.
The business-building modules were pure gold. Implemented the referral system and saw 36% revenue increase in 2 months. Finally feel like a legitimate professional in the default space.

I've taken 7 courses in this field, but this one stands out. The practical focus on client acquisition helped me pivot my entire business model. Within 2 months I had launched group programs. The community support was incredible too.

This certification completely transformed my practice. I was struggling to transition from corporate HR to Default, and this course gave me the exact framework I needed. The assessment framework module alone was worth the investment. Now I have 5 new clients and finally feel confident in my niche.

Finally, a certification that respects your intelligence. The theoretical framework section gave me the conceptual foundation I was missing from my undergraduate studies. Now I can confidently explain systems theory to clients and colleagues.

I've taken 11 courses in this field, but this one stands out. The practical focus on outcome measurement helped me pivot my entire business model. Within 90 days I had launched group programs. The community support was incredible too.
The business-building modules were pure gold. Implemented the value ladder and saw 127% revenue increase in 2 months. Finally feel like a legitimate professional in the default space.
ROI was insane. Paid for itself in 1 month after I landed my first {niche_client_type} client using the client journey map from Module 1. Now charging $341 per session vs $71 before. Game changer.

Decent course. The the core training module was fantastic, but Module 6 didn't deliver as much value. Wanted more interactive elements. Still learned enough to justify the cost, but room for improvement.

This certification completely transformed my practice. I was struggling to transition from corporate HR to Default, and this course gave me the exact framework I needed. The advanced protocols module alone was worth the investment. Now I have 12 new clients and finally feel confident in my niche.

Best professional investment I've made in years. The step-by-step breakdown made complex topics accessible, and I immediately applied goal-setting framework with my first client post-certification. Revenue up 80% in 90 days. Worth every penny.

Best professional investment I've made in years. The clear explanations made complex topics accessible, and I immediately applied goal-setting framework with my first client post-certification. Revenue up 87% in 3 months. Worth every penny.

This certification completely transformed my practice. I was struggling to transition from general wellness coaching to Default, and this course gave me the exact framework I needed. The assessment framework module alone was worth the investment. Now I have 6 new clients and finally feel confident in my niche.
ROI was insane. Paid for itself in 3 weeks after I landed my first {niche_client_type} client using the pricing framework from Module 4. Now charging $314 per session vs $65 before. Game changer.

Solid content overall, but I wish there was more on advanced assessment. The Module 5 module felt rushed compared to others. Still valuable, just expected more depth given the price point. Would recommend, but set expectations accordingly.

Solid content overall, but I wish there was more on advanced assessment. The the ethics module module felt rushed compared to others. Still valuable, just expected more depth given the price point. Would recommend, but set expectations accordingly.

The practice exercises made all the difference. I learn best by reading and reflecting, and the course accommodated that perfectly. The case study walkthrough helped me finally understand ethical gray areas.

Skeptical about the price initially, but the client handouts templates alone saved me 15 hours of work. Closed 8 new clients in 3 months using the pitch framework from the ethics module. Already made back 4x my investment.

Good certification with practical tools, though some modules felt repetitive. The progress tracker was excellent, but advanced techniques could use expansion. Worth it if you're new to default, but experienced practitioners might find some sections basic.

Skeptical about the price initially, but the assessment forms templates alone saved me 24 hours of work. Closed 8 new clients in 90 days using the pitch framework from the assessment section. Already made back 4x my investment.

This certification completely transformed my practice. I was struggling to transition from traditional therapy to Default, and this course gave me the exact framework I needed. Best professional investment I've made in years. The practical focus made complex topics accessible, and I immediately applied session planner with my first client post-certification. Revenue up 115% in 6 weeks. Worth every penny.
